questions.text: Who was dropping water balloons on Woody in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Norm and Cliff.

	They tricked Woody into moving a box top with an X on it, making him think that was the bull's eye. Woody being gullible just thought they had bad aim.

questions.text: What did Rebecca say she did on the 12th?
questions.explanation:
Ovulated.

	Sam asked her how he was supposed to know that. Norm said, "We all knew it, it's in the newsletter."

questions.text: Who commented on how much Rebecca and Sam fight?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	He said, "You two fight a lot for two people who aren't in love but want to have a baby." He then said that he didn't know if it was normal or not since he "never met two people who weren't in love but wanted to have a baby".

questions.text: Did Frasier ever have the chicken pox?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Frasier said that the thought of somebody having fun while he was stuck home, nothing could make him feel worse. Lilith asked him if he ever had the chicken pox and when Frasier moaned she said, "I can always think of something to make him feel worse".

questions.text: Who told the guys about the Polar Bear Club?
questions.explanation:
Paul.

	The polar bear club is when people strip down to just a bathing suit in the winter and then jump in an ocean, lake, etc. Paul told them he used to do it all the time as a child. He forgot to mention he was brought up in Honolulu.

questions.text: What did Sam want to name the baby if it was a boy?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Rebecca wasn't sure because she thought that naming a child after you was saying you wanted him to be just like you. Sam replied, "OK Sam it is."

questions.text: What did the guy who knocked on the door say the secret to marriage was?
questions.explanation:
Love.

	He said if the mother and father loved each other they'd pass that love on to the kids.  We find there's not much love in the man's family.

questions.text: When Sam had his 2nd vision of his son what did Sam Jr. do?
questions.explanation:
Robbed a store.

	He told Sam Sr. that he did it because his parents didn't love each other. He then yelled out the window, "My name is Sam Malone and my dad was a relief pitcher and he didn't love my mother!"

questions.text: When did Rebecca start to change her mind about having a baby?
questions.correct: When she saw how much in love the newlyweds were
options: When she realized how sleazy Sam really was
When Sam told her about his vision
questions.explanation:
When she saw how much in love the newlyweds were.

	She pictures her life with Sam and they are still fighting. in her daydream, Sam is with another woman when Rebecca comes in the house.

questions.text: Who was the only one who actually went in the water (the Polar Bear Club)?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	He said it was surreal. Cliff and Norm kept pushing him back into the water.
